questions.question: The Shang Dynasty ruled from 1700 to 1122 B.C.E in an area in the

choices.answer: Huang He Valley.
Chang Jiang River.
East China Sea.
Jade Oracle City.

questions.question: For hundreds of years, Western scholars believed that the Shang Dynasty was a legend because

choices.answer: ancient Chinese texts portrayed it as a mythical place.
archeologists did not have any solid evidence it existed.
stories made it seem too advanced for it to be possible.
people found texts that opposed the idea of its existence.

questions.question: What is significant about the Chinese city, Anyang?

choices.answer: It was where many Shang artifacts were found.
It is the mythical city in ancient Chinese stories.
It was the Shang dynasty's most rural area.
It was where the Shang peasants were confined.

questions.question: What did the Shang do to ensure their kings were served in the afterlife?

choices.answer: They buried animals, servants, and slaves in the tombs.
They made each farmer perform an oracle bone ritual.
The nobles had to give up their land for the dead kings.

questions.question: Which of the following was part of the Shang Dynasty?

choices.answer: a palace
a temple
houses

choices.answer: battle against their siblings for the throne.

choices.answer: They were among the first civilizations to make bronze.

.He would not interfere with their control over the land

choices.answer: Their land was controlled by the king or the nobles.

choices.answer: quartz and ruby.
straw and grass.
paper and glass.

questions.question: What is one reason the Shang were able to stay in power for over five hundred years?

choices.answer: The rulers often had very large families.
They had very good bronze-making skills.
They were smart about spending money.

questions.question: Which of the following is a possible reason the Shang dynasty ended?

choices.answer: Constant warfare severely weakened their military strength.
Shang rulers spent money lavishly, weakening their economy.
A Zhou army attacked the Shang and defeated them.
all of the above
